description:
The housekeeper`s daughter. She came to visit http://anidb.net/ch90513 [Itsuki] after hearing stories about him. She was the motivation for http://anidb.net/ch90513 [Itsuki] to become a writer. After having rejected his confession because she only saw him as a little brother, she was prohibited from visiting any more.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Mitahori Ayane
